Экс-президенту Аргентины Фернандесу предъявили обвинения в домашнем насилии
content: Федеральный прокурор Аргентины Рамиро Гонсалес предъявил обвинения в домашнем насилии бывшему президенту страны Альберто Фернандесу. Дело касается бывшей первой леди Аргентины Фабиолы Яньес, которая обвинила экс-президента в систематическом насилии и психологическом давлении. Фернандес вину не признает, а показания женщины называет ложными. Бывший президент Аргентины Альберто Фернандес Фото: Пресс-служба Президента РФ Бывший президент Аргентины Альберто Фернандес Фото: Пресс-служба Президента РФ Рамиро Гонсалес распорядился допросить бывших должностных лиц Аргентины, бывшего лечащего врача экс-президента, а также запросил записи с камер видеонаблюдения с виллы, где жила Фабиола Яньес. Прокурор потребовал предоставить ему записи о здоровье господина Фернандеса, его обследованиях и истории болезней. «С того момента, как Фабиола Яньес начала встречаться с Альберто Фернандесом, и до сегодняшнего дня женщина страдала от отношений, характеризующихся преследованием и физическими нападениями в контексте гендерного и домашнего насилия»,— приводит слова прокурора La Nacion . В письме прокурор описал девять эпизодов физического и психологического насилия, которые начались в 2016 году. В частности, по его утверждению, Альберто Фернандес заставил спутницу сделать аборт, ударил ногой в живот, когда она могла быть беременна, регулярно бил ее по лицу, угрожал. Альберто Фернандес...

title: Mumbai: Resident doctors refuse to roll back strike
creator: Mid-day
content: The deadlock continues between protesting resident doctors and state and local health authorities, as the doctors refuse to call off their strike demanding better security at and a central law with strict penalties for those who commit violence against healthcare workers. ADVERTISEMENT The wave of strikes and protests erupted across the city and the country in response to the rape and murder of a trainee doctor in Kolkata. Dr Pratik Debaje, president of the (MARD), voiced concern over the lack of clear guidelines from state authorities on how security at state-run public hospitals will be strengthened. “We have also not received any immediate action plans from hospitals in response to the strike,” he said. A meeting was held between Rajeev Nivatkar and the deans of state-run hospitals, including JJ hospital. While Dr Pallavi Saple, the dean of JJ hospital, was unavailable for comment, Nivatkar said, “At this stage, not much can be revealed as certain decisions are still in the pipeline. But we have assured the resident doctors that their key demands regarding security will be met.” Meanwhile, the Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC) administration finds itself constrained as resident doctors in civic hospitals remain on strike in solidarity with their counterparts nationwide. “We support the strike because the issue is very serious. What happened was unfortunate, but...

title: ‘Should’ve won gold’
creator: Mid-day
content: A proud owner of two consecutive Olympic medals, Indian hockey star says the bronze claimed in Tokyo three years ago is closer to his heart than the one fetched in Paris as the former was like a mythical tale coming true after decades of merely hearing about it. ADVERTISEMENT The 36-year-old goalkeeper, who bid adieu to his international career at the end of India’s Paris campaign, was, in fact, a shade disappointed with the colour of the medal this time as he felt the team should have done better. “Tokyo for sure because we won an Olympic medal after a long time. Earlier, we used to hear what an Olympic medal means as hockey has a rich history of gold, silver and bronze medals. But it never came in our hands. So when we got it for the first time, that was a moment,” Sreejesh told PTI when asked to make the difficult choice here on Tuesday. “That time we were not sure about winning a medal but this time we were in top six and capable of beating any team. But [in Tokyo] to become a medallist was a dream,” he explained the difference. 41-year wait before Tokyo India’s hockey team had not won an Olympic medal in 41 years when it entered the Tokyo Games. Cut to Paris, the side were expected to be among the Top 2, which made a laudable third place finish look a bit disappointing and Sreejesh agreed. “...this time, we had that hope that we are going to be [number] one. I feel it is...

title: Mumbai: Multiple bridges could turn BKC into walker’s paradise
creator: Mid-day
content: A few key pedestrian bridges linking BKC with Kurla, Sion, and Chunabhatti could transform pedestrian dynamics and provide easy walking access to BKC, according to the to the MMRDA and the guardian minister. This is one of many recommendations gathered from a survey conducted at BKC, which identified issues and proposed enhancements to make the area more pedestrian-friendly. With the Station Area Traffic Improvement Scheme (SATIS) at Kurla station now sanctioned by the Chief Minister’s Office—following a follow-up by mid-day and local MLA Mangesh Kudalkar —the proposal gains further significance. ADVERTISEMENT If the MMRDA were to add a few over the Mithi river, similar to the ones in Ahmedabad, the walking distance between Kurla station and Diamond Bourse could be reduced by nearly 25 per cent, from 2.1 km to 1.6 km,” said Vedant Mhatre, programme director of the Walking Project. “Furthermore, enhancing pedestrian access around Kurla station by implementing traffic calming measures, improving parking management and ensuring thorough cleaning could boost the average walking speed from 4 km/h to 5 km/h,” he added in a letter addressed to the authorities. The two proposed bridges in could connect the New Mill Road/SG Barve Road path and another from Belgrami Road. “Adding another bridge and a few foot overbridges (FOBs) further south would make it feasible for pedestrians to...

title: Pakistan rewards Nadeem Rs 7.52cr for Olympic title
creator: Mid-day
content: Olympic javelin gold medalist received a total of 250 million rupees (Rs 7.52cr) on Tuesday as Pakistan continued to celebrate his record-breaking throw at the Paris Games. ADVERTISEMENT Pakistan’s prime minister, Shehbaz Sharif, announced 150 million rupees (R4.51cr) for Nadeem at a special ceremony to honour the star athlete in Islamabad. Sharif’s announcement came hours after Punjab’s chief minister Mariam Nawaz visited Nadeem’s house in a village in the Mian Channu district and presented him with a check for 100 million rupees (Rs 3.01cr). Nawaz also handed him the keys to a new car which has a special registration number of “PAK 92.97” to commemorate Nadeem’s throw of 92.97 meters at Paris, which was an Olympic record. Nadeem’s coach Salman Iqbal Butt was also given five million rupees (Rs 15.05 lakh). “You have doubled the delight of 250 million Pakistanis because we’ll also celebrate our Independence Day tomorrow,” Sharif said while announcing the money for Nadeem, whose father is a daily wage labourer.

title: 雨彈轟全台 未來1周天氣2重點 中南部周日起慎防劇烈降雨
content: 近期天氣有兩個重點,中央氣象署預報員官欣平表示,一是各地午後雷陣雨感受上比較劇烈、範圍比較廣一些,降雨甚至到晚間;此外,中南部降雨接下來幾天的天氣特別不穩定,尤其周日之後到下周二,陣雨或雷雨情況較為廣泛,有可能來到大雨或 豪雨 。 官欣平表示,台灣附近處於一個大的低壓帶,整個低壓環流相當明顯,位在中國大陸這邊,台灣一路延伸到日本比較偏南方這段。在低壓環流邊緣有許多熱帶系統生成,包括安比颱風今天上午8時已增強為中度颱風,還有輕颱悟空,下方還有幾個小的低壓系統陸續生長,順著低壓環流方向,朝北邊前進。 官欣平說,這樣低壓環流也造成台灣附近天氣不穩定,整體風向偏西南風,迎風面中南部地區比較容易下雨。整個西半部、包括台灣附近整個海面上的對流發展相當多,表示大氣處於非常不穩定的情況,中午之後午後熱對流發展起來,比較劇烈的降雨隨之可能會出現。 今天白天以後,中部以北、各地山區比較明顯,各地都有機會,降雨比較大的地區以山區、東南部為主。官欣平表示,中南部地區降雨不只是午後熱對流,從沿海進來一波波降雨,為西南風所帶進來,最近幾天比較明顯,下午開始降雨也會慢慢出現。今天偏西南部沿海,晚上還是有一波波降雨。至於整個西半部、甚至東半部的部分區域午後雷陣雨延續的時間也會比較晚一點。 氣象署今天上午發布大雨特報,對流雲系發展旺盛,易有短延時強降雨,今天西半部地區及東半部山區有局部大雨發生的機率,注意雷擊及強陣風,低窪地區慎防積水,山區慎防坍方、落石及溪水暴漲。大雨:基隆北海岸、台北市、新北市、桃園市、新竹市、新竹縣、苗栗縣、台中市、彰化縣、南投縣、雲林縣、嘉義市、嘉義縣、台南市、高雄市、屏東縣、恆春半島、宜蘭縣山區、花蓮縣山區、台東縣山區。 未來天氣趨勢,官欣平表示,太平洋高壓會逐漸增強、逐漸靠近,並且整個軸心指向台灣南方海域;但是太平洋高壓增強過程當中,台灣還是屬於大低壓帶的影響到下周二,所以要到下周三之後太平洋高壓影響才會出現,天氣將比較穩定,雖然還是有午後熱對流,但是發生時間點偏下午後,中南部的西南風迎風面降雨情形也將趨於緩和。 官欣平表示,高壓逐漸增強的過程當中,下周二之前台灣位屬於低壓和高壓邊緣,西南風比較強一點,送上來的水氣比較多一些,特別在周日、下周一、下周二西南風搭配上台灣在低壓帶邊緣,高壓還沒有來,仍會有劇烈天氣的可能。 降雨趨勢分兩部分,官欣平表示,分別是今天到周六,以及周日至下周二,有程度上的一些區別。今天到周六午後雷陣雨主要在中部以北各地山區可能有大雨或豪雨,但時間比較短一點,大約是下午到晚上前。中南部降雨因為西南風帶進來,可能一整天有陣雨或雷雨,特別是南台灣、台南以南可能有局部大雨,各個離島天氣也相對不穩定。 官欣平表示,周日到下周二,當高壓開始增強,但台灣位於低壓和高壓邊緣,西南風的風力比較強一點,環境狀況不穩定,雨勢上南台灣有增加趨勢,從台中以南的天氣變化比較大一點,特別是南部地區甚至可能有局部豪雨,其他地區防範中午過後可能有局部大雨情形。下周一至下周五左右適逢年度大潮,中南部留意排水情形,可能有積淹水狀況。 未來降雨趨勢。圖/中央氣象署提供

title: Mumbai: Bandra fair stall rent slashed from Rs 3,000 to Rs 900
creator: Mid-day
content: After four days and meeting with higher-ups, the maximum rent stallholders must pay to operate at the during the upcoming Bandra fair was slashed from Rs 3,000 to Rs 900 on Wednesday. As opposed to the previous system, the church decided to opt for unified rates and announced they could not lower the rent further. However, stallholders are still not satisfied and want the old stall allotment system reinstated. ADVERTISEMENT Long-time stallholders have been protesting ever since the church decided to implement a new system to allot stalls as well as revise rents to meet the expenses of infrastructure. The fair will begin on September 8 and the church started distributing forms on August 11. Approximately 150 stalls are allowed every year on the steps to sell candles, flowers, food and toys and many of the have been running them for generations. In 2022, the rent was Rs 150 per sq ft for eight days. Last year, the church increased the rent from Rs 150 to Rs 350. This year, it introduced a colour code system for different stalls where the rent was between Rs 1,250 and 3,000 per sq ft. After strong opposition to distributing forms, , vice-rector of the church announced the lowering of the rent by 20 to 33 per cent on Tuesday. But the stallholders weren’t satisfied with that and a few of them visited Bishop Dominic Savio at Cumballa Hill on Wednesday morning. “Bishop Savio...

title: Prediksi Skor Bilbao vs Getafe, Cek Head to Head dan Statistik Tim, Kick off 00.00 WIB
content: - akan menjamu di Stadion San Mamés dalam pertandingan pembuka Spanyol malam ini. Kick off laga tersebut akan dimulai pukul 00.00 WIB, Jumat (16/8/2024) dini hari. Tuan rumah finis di posisi kelima dalam klasemen liga musim lalu, mengamankan tempat di babak penyisihan grup Liga Eropa UEFA sementara tim tamu finis di posisi ke-12. Tuan rumah menjalani pramusim yang sibuk, dengan memainkan tujuh pertandingan persahabatan. Mereka menderita kekalahan dalam dua pertandingan persahabatan terakhir dan kalah 4-0 dari Stuttgart minggu lalu, gagal mencetak gol untuk kedua kalinya di pramusim. Tim tamu mengalami rentetan tanpa kemenangan dalam empat pertandingan persahabatan pertama mereka musim ini, gagal mencetak gol dalam tiga pertandingan. Mereka bangkit dengan baik dalam dua pertandingan persahabatan terakhir dan ditahan imbang tanpa gol oleh Southampton minggu lalu. Head to Head dan Statistik Tim Kedua tim telah bertemu sebanyak 38 kali di semua kompetisi. Mereka telah bertanding secara ketat dalam pertemuan-pertemuan ini, dengan 17 pertandingan berakhir seri. Tuan rumah memiliki rekor yang lebih baik dalam pertandingan-pertandingan ini dengan keunggulan 12-9 dalam kemenangan. Tuan rumah tidak terkalahkan dalam delapan pertemuan terakhirnya melawan tim tamu, dengan enam pertandingan berakhir seri. Bilbao bermain imbang 2-2 di kandang sendiri di musim lalu dan mencatat kemenangan...

title: Aditya Seal: ‘Mudassar sir and I talked to each other as Samar’
creator: Mid-day
content: When Aditya Seal got wind of Khel Khel Mein being made by Mudassar Aziz, he instinctively wanted to be a part of it. He says landing a role in the , Taapsee Pannu and Vaani Kapoor-starrer wasn’t easy. “I had to fight my way into the role. I have worked with Mudassar sir on another film, which hasn’t been released yet, but my character in is the polar opposite of what I am in real life. No one had seen me play such a part before, so it was difficult for everyone to imagine me in it,” he recalls. ADVERTISEMENT The actor says it was only after seeing his audition that Aziz was confident about casting him. “I tested for the role. That’s how the [team’s] perception changed.” Khel Khel Mein revolves around seven friends, who decide to test their honesty with each other by sharing every text and call they receive over one night. Seal credits the director for guiding him to play Samar, an ambitious man trapped in a clingy relationship. “Over dinner, Mudassar sir and I came up with his backstory. Then we both started role-playing; we started talking to each other as Samar, adopting his body language, and thought process. That’s how we cracked it.”

title: Mumbai: Passenger associations and Railways meet ends in dead-end
creator: Mid-day
content: A Marathon three-hour meeting between numerous and the divisional railway manager of Central Railway Mumbai failed to reach any consensus on Wednesday. The railways tried to convey to the associations that none of their demands could be practically fulfilled in the given scenario while the passenger associations remained firm on their call for peaceful protest on August 22. ADVERTISEMENT “Today, we had a meeting with Mumbai Goyal sir at 12 pm. There were several organisations gathered for the meeting. We were told that due to limited infrastructure and space to expand, it is difficult for them to increase the services. We were told that running Diva-Thane local, Thane Kasara, Thane-Karjat local trains was also difficult due to unavailability of resources. We will continue our peaceful White Day Protest on August 22, and request meeting with Chief Minister Eknath Shinde and Railway Minister Ashwiniji Vaishnav,” Siddhesh Desai, vice-president of the Mumbai Rail Pravasi Sangh, one of the oldest and biggest passenger associations, said. Desai said the railways gave a positive response to the demand of —Guravali and Parsik. Association leaders have already been slapped with legal notices and warned against creating any disruption of rail services on August 22 during the protest. Railway officials said to reduce congestion in , Mumbai Urban Transport Project (MUTP)-II costing R8,087...

title: Mumbai: NRI mastermind behind deaf-mute murder plot revealed
creator: Mid-day
content: The have contacted the Foreign Registration Office (FRO) to request details on the travel history of Jagpalpreet Singh, an NRI from Belgium, identified as the mastermind behind the murder of Arshad Ali Sadiq Ali Shaikh, a deaf and mute victim from Kalina. Police have determined that Singh’s insecurity over leading the deaf and mute community on an Instagram group was the primary motive behind the murder. They discovered that Singh had instructed the killers via video call, claiming that Shaikh had defamed their community. ADVERTISEMENT On August 5, Shaikh, 33, was Jay Pawan Chawda, 32, and Shivjeet Singh, 34, at a house in Pydhonie. They used a hammer and broken beer bottles to kill Shaikh and then packed his body into a suitcase. They intended to dispose of the body on an express train at Dadar platform 11 but were intercepted by the railway police before they could execute their plan. During the investigation, police arrested Shaikh’s wife, Rukshana Shaikh, who was implicated in the murder and had been having an affair with Chawda for years. The investigation revealed that Shaikh had frequently clashed with Chawda and Shivjeet. He had previously recorded videos of himself assaulting both men and posted them on Instagram. This angered Jagpalpreet Singh, who warned Shaikh multiple times to stop. Singh was also worried about losing his leadership role within the community due...

title: Oh Manjulika, kal aana
creator: Mid-day
content: What have Manjulika and Stree got to do with each other? The two have almost nothing in common, except that both are fierce spirits, feared by the characters in their films and loved by the audiences. But it looks like one has impacted the other. Stree 2’s power was felt at the box office as soon as the advance booking opened on Sunday, with the film expected to take one of the year’s biggest openings today. Sources tell us that looking at the euphoria around Rajkummar Rao and Shraddha Kapoor’s horror comedy, the team of has changed its plans to launch the film’s teaser. “The makers were set to unveil the teaser this week, marking the beginning of their promotional campaign for Kartik Aaryan’s Diwali release. But they have decided to push it so that the teaser doesn’t get lost amid the Stree 2 hype,” says a source. ADVERTISEMENT Anees Bazmee’s directorial venture sees Madhuri Dixit-Nene and join the cast. Vidya Balan, who led the first instalment along with Akshay Kumar in 2007, has returned to the horror comedy’s universe with the upcoming edition. The source adds, “The makers’ decision was aided by the fact that both Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3 and Stree 2 are horror comedies. After the smashing success of Bhool Bhulaiyaa 2 (2022), the team aims to up the ante with the third instalment. It’s an ambitious film for the whole team. Kartik thought the teaser should get complete attention,...

title: Mumbai: 42 per cent of potholes this year were on the two highways
creator: Mid-day
content: OF the over 16,000 potholes reported with the BMC this monsoon, 42 per cent were on both highways alone, the (WEH) and Eastern Express Highway (EEH). The BMC is on its toes to fill up potholes, as large Ganesh idols have started moving to their respective pandals. BMC officials had assured Sarvajanik Ganeshotsav Mandals at a meeting last week that the potholes would be filled by August 18. ADVERTISEMENT As per , there were 16,145 potholes till August 13, most of which were in Andheri, Mahim, Malad, Ghatkopar, Byculla, Mankhurd and Kurla. In addition, the WEH had 3,386 and EEH had 3,400. The (MMRDA) handed over control of two major arterial roads--WEH and EEH--to the BMC. The handover took place after the then BMC commissioner, Iqbal Singh Chahal, urged the Bombay High Court (HC) in September 2022 to make BMC the sole planning authority for all roads in the city. The EEH is 23.55 km long from Mulund to Sion. The WEH, stretching from the suburb of Dahisar to Bandra is 25.33 km. The Ganeshotsav will start from September 7, but the large idols have already started moving to pandals for decoration. By this weekend most of the mandals will start bringing their idols. like every year and though the BMC claimed that there are very few potholes now, the coordination committee, in a meeting held on August 6, already expressed worry regarding the uneven patches. Suresh Sarnobat,...

title: Mumbai: Fresh debate over non-veg food at IIT-B canteen
creator: Mid-day
content: A fresh controversy has arisen at the after the institute’s hygiene committee put up a notice in one of the canteens prohibiting the entry of non-vegetarian food into a “pure-vegetarian” canteen. The notice, which has sparked widespread debate across the campus and left the students divided on the issue, was shared on social media by the Ambedkar Periyar Phule Study Circle (APPSC), a prominent students’ collective at the institute. ADVERTISEMENT The notice, prominently displayed at the Amul Canteen in the , reads: “Amul Canteen is a pure-vegetarian eatery. Bringing non-vegetarian stuff even in the canteen’s dining area is strictly not allowed.” This decision has been met with strong reactions, particularly from the APPSC, which condemned the policy as an example of “veg purism”. In its social media posts, criticised the notice, questioning the rationale behind such strict regulations in a canteen that lacks a properly enclosed dining area. The group posted on X, with one of the messages stating: “The said canteen does not even have a properly enclosed dining area, still they are obsessed with creating more and more enclosures for the ‘pure-vegetarians’. #UCinsecurities.” The APPSC further expressed their concerns about the policy, saying, “This is not the first time IIT Bombay is witnessing such hegemonic behaviour. In the past, we have seen attempts to enforce a Brahmanical...

title: Nick Jonas locks lips with his `Forever Date` Priyanka Chopra in adorable video
creator: Mid-day
content: Singer and actor Nick Jonas always melt the hearts of his fans whenever he shares adorable moments with his better half and actor Priyanka Chopra. Again, he left his fans in awe with a lovable video featuring his 'Forever Date'. ADVERTISEMENT On Wednesday, dropped a video on Instagram where Priyanka can be seen happily posing for photographs while Nick is recording her. Then, the couple can be seen kissing each other and enjoying the happy moment. Along with the post, he wrote, "My forever date". Priyanka wore a green outfit while Nick chose to wear formal wear. As soon as he shared the post, fans flooded the comment section. A user wrote, "How beautiful they are". Another fan commented, "I love this couple." Priyanka and Nick got married in a Christian and a Hindu ceremony in Jodhpur's Umaid Bhawan Palace on December 1 and 2 in 2018. In January 2022, the two announced that they welcomed daughter Malti Marie via surrogacy. Recently, wrapped the shooting of her upcoming film 'The Bluff' and shared a glimpse of the wrap-up featuring her family including Nick Jonas, Malti Marie and her mother Madhu Chopra and the cast of the film. 'The Bluff' which is directed by Frank E Flowers also features actor Karl Urban.'The Bluff' is set in the 19th-century Caribbean and follows the story of a former female pirate, played by Priyanka, who must protect her family when the sins of her past...

title: 49 years of `Sholay`: What makes the film an eternal masterpiece
creator: Mid-day
content: In the grand tapestry of Indian Cinema, certain films stand as timeless landmarks, shaping the storytelling and defining its cultural impact for generations. One such film is ' ', a cinematic marvel that has not only stood the test of time but has also become a cultural phenomenon. As we mark 49 years of its release, it’s the perfect moment to reflect on what makes Sholay an eternal masterpiece. ADVERTISEMENT Birth of a classic Released on August 15, 1975, 'Sholay' was the brainchild of writers and directed by Ramesh Sippy. It was a time when Bollywood was transitioning, with filmmakers experimenting with different genres, narratives, and styles. 'Sholay' emerged as a film that seamlessly blended various elements—action, drama, romance, comedy, and music—creating a genre-defining "masala" film that appealed to audiences across the spectrum. The film is set in the fictional village of Ramgarh and tells the story of two small-time crooks, Jai (Amitabh Bachchan) and Veeru (Dharmendra) who are hired by a retired policeman, Thakur Baldev Singh (Sanjeev Kumar), to capture the notorious dacoit Gabbar Singh (Amjad Khan). What unfolds is an epic tale of friendship, revenge, and justice, set against the backdrop of rural India. Unforgettable characters One of the reasons for 'Sholay’s' everlasting appeal is its rich tapestry of characters, each etched into the collective memory of...

title: Nick Jonas: ‘We’ll be there to guide her’
creator: Mid-day
content: American popstar Nick Jonas has talked about his daughter, Malti Marie Chopra Jonas, following in the footsteps of her father and mother, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, in choosing careers. “I mean she could. She’s certainly full of personality,” Jonas told in an interview. ADVERTISEMENT Talking about Chopra and his journey in showbiz, said that it is a “brilliant industry” but is also a “wild ride”. “We’ve both been working so long that we understand that this is a brilliant industry to be a part of. We’re fortunate to have the kind of careers we have had but it also is a wild ride,” he shared. The Sucker hitmaker says Chopra and he will guide their little one, if she needs help. “So, we want her to take her sweet time making that decision and you know we’ll be there to guide her every step in her way if she wants.” Describing his wife, Jonas said, “She is so beautiful.” Chopra and Jonas started dating in 2018. It was the same year in July when the singer to the actor, a day after her birthday in Greece. The two got married in Jodhpur in an intimate but grand celebration. They welcomed their first child Malti via surrogacy in 2022. Chopra has wrapped up shooting for the swashbuckler film, The Bluff, directed by Frank E Flowers. Shot in Australia, The Bluff also stars Karl Urban, Ismael Cruz Cordova, Safia Oakley-Green, and Vedanten Naidoo. It is set in the Caribbean Islands during...

title: Clooney won’t collaborate with Russell again, says ‘not worth it’
creator: Mid-day
content: George Clooney has vehemently ruled out a future collaboration with David O Russell, the director of Three Kings (1999). ADVERTISEMENT In a joint interview with frequent collaborator and friend for a magazine, the two stars discussed their ideal working environment in terms of colleagues. “The older you get, time allotment is very different. Five months out of your life is a lot,” said. The actor, 63, then talked about how he would not collaborate with Russell, even if it means letting go of an opportunity to make a “really good film”. “So it’s not like, ‘Oh, I’m going to go do a really good film, like Three Kings.’ I’m going to have a miserable f*** like David O Russell making my life hell. Making every person in the crew’s life hell. It’s not worth it. Not at this point in my life. Just to have a good product,” Clooney said. The black comedy war film had faced significant controversy due to the tumultuous relationship between director Russell and Clooney, with their on-set clashes making headlines and overshadowing its release. It was also reported in the media that the director allegedly got physical with an extra on set, leading to an intervention by Clooney. Also starring Mark Wahlberg, Ice Cube and Spike Jonze, Three Kings was about four American soldiers who pull off a gold heist during the 1991 uprisings in Iraq against Saddam Hussein, following the end of the First...

title: 96萬餐費烏龍還算小條?柯文哲自爆:帳目差額恐逾2000萬
creator: 張庭維
content: 民眾黨主席柯文哲陷政治獻金假帳案,北檢在12日分他字案調查,14日大動作搜索會計師端木正的事務所以及跟案情有關的木可公司,並在晚間以被告身分約談端木正、木可公司負責人李文娟,傳喚時任柯競辦財務長李文宗及時樂、尼奧負責人戴利玲,檢調速度之快也引發外界高度關注。柯文哲今(15)日受訪被問到會不會覺得是政治追殺,他表示,如果中華民國政府效率都這麼高,「我們是很樂見」。 [啟動LINE推播] 每日重大新聞通知 柯文哲上午走出家門準備去黨部開會,外頭有大批媒體堵訪,被問到木可公司在爭議爆發後當天即刻停止營業,是否擔心被滅證?柯文哲表示,即刻停止營業是用講的,那個要清算幹什麼,有時一家公司要關掉要好幾個月。 而針對政治獻金爭議,檢調火速搜索,會不會覺得是政治追殺,柯文哲強調,「如果中華民國政府效率都這麼高,我們是很樂見,就這樣」。 而日前在被爆出96萬元「素食便當」的帳目,民眾黨副秘書長許甫有出面說明又是會計師的登入搞烏龍,會不會覺得很委屈?柯文哲嘆道,帳目加起來總共超過18萬筆,偶爾會有1、2筆記錯,那他不覺得奇怪,誤差個幾萬塊可以接受,但現在那個誤差快超過2000萬,那就真的太烏龍了。 媒體追問,帳目誤差將近2000萬,是否不排除有人貪污的可能?柯文哲強調,自己還是有信心,因為每一筆支出都有憑證,當然說這憑證有沒有是每一項都合理,這可以討論,但法律上每筆支出都有憑證,這是能確定的。 柯文哲指出,先前查過40萬元以上的憑證,昨天還一直在繼續往下查,至少到目前為止,支出都有憑證,這沒問題。 媒體再問,現在查出差額有多少?柯文哲表示,應該超過2000萬,還在查。 更多風傳媒獨家新聞: ‧ 幕後》大亂3天!殺完端木正、黃珊珊 柯文哲才承認自己對「他」識人不明 ‧ 幕後》檢方指定調查局「虎狼之師」辦柯文哲假帳疑案 高虹安也栽在他們手下

title: 高雄深夜濃煙焦味瀰漫民眾恐慌 環保局揪出私人停車場露天燒廢棄物
content: 高雄市 楠梓區、大社區昨日晚間10時許有許多民眾聞到異味, 環保局 接獲陳情後派人查察,在大社區一處私人停車場內,發現1名謝姓男子正在燃燒棧板、塑膠袋等 廢棄物 。環保局說,男子貪圖方便,以燃燒的方式處理廢棄物,造成下風處 空氣汙染 ,將依空氣汙染防制法裁處10萬至500萬元罰鍰外,違法處理廢棄物部分將依廢棄物清理法移送法辦。 環保局表示,昨晚接獲多起民眾陳情,異口同聲指出在大社、楠梓多處路段煙霧瀰漫,且有濃厚燃燒異味。民眾聞到異味,紛紛外出查看狀況,深怕是火災或是有管線洩漏。 警消獲報後研判不是濃霧或是水蒸氣造成。由於微型感測站呈現帶狀高值,環保局派人使用夜間熱顯像空拍巡查,搭配地面人力循上風處尋找,確認異味來自大社區某私人停車場。 環保局說,稽查人員昨晚11時39分許在大社區圳觀段1038地號1處私人貨車停車場內,查獲停車場老闆謝姓男子(75歲)把棧板、紙類、塑膠袋及雜物垃圾等廢棄物,放在鐵籠內燃燒,產生的煙流漂向大社、楠梓區一帶,造成下風處空氣汙染;現場已要求謝男撲滅改善。 環保局表示,謝男貪圖方便,未依規定妥善處理廢棄物,以燃燒方式處理,造成空氣汙染,已違反空汙法第32條規定,將裁處10萬至500萬元罰鍰。另謝男未取得處理許可、違法處理廢棄物部分,已涉犯廢清法46條規定,完成相關調查後移送法辦。 環保局說,民眾及事業單位應妥善處理廢棄物,不得任意進行燃燒影響周遭空氣品質,環保局將加強取締污染熱區露天燃燒行為,民眾若發現非法燃燒情事,可撥打1999或環保局報案專線07-7317600,主動向當地環保局舉發,共同維護空氣品質。 高雄大社區一處停車場的謝姓老闆昨晚在停車場內露天燃燒廢棄物,造成下風處空氣汙染。圖/環保局提供 環保局派員使用夜間熱顯像空拍巡查,揪出大社區一處私人停車場非法燃燒廢棄物。圖/環保局提供 高市環保局查獲大社區一處私人停車場內露天燃燒廢棄物,當場要求停車場謝姓老闆(左)撲滅改善。圖/環保局提供

title: El uno por uno de River en el triunfo ante Talleres en la ida de octavos de la Copa
CAS dismisses Vinesh Phogat’s appeal for shared silver
creator: Mid-day
content: Indian wrestler ’s appeal against her disqualification from Olympic Games final has been rejected by the ad-hoc division of the Court of Arbitration for Sport (CAS), the Indian Olympic Association said on Wednesday. ADVERTISEMENT Vinesh was disqualified for being 100gm overweight at the time of the weigh-in on the morning of the women’s 50kg freestyle final last week. In a statement, IOA President PT Usha expressed “shock and disappointment at the decision of the Sole Arbitrator at the CAS to dismiss wrestler Vinesh Phogat’s application against the United World Wrestling [UWW] and the International Olympic Committee [IOC]. “The operative part of the August 14 decision, which dismisses Vinesh’s application to be awarded a shared silver medal in women’s 50 kg category at the Paris Olympic Games has significant implications for her in particular and the sporting community at large,” the IOA stated. The rejection of Vinesh’s appeal means India’s tally from the Paris Olympics will be of six medals which includes one silver and five bronze.

title: Bangladesh: शेख मुजीब की पुण्यतिथि पर सार्वजनिक छुट्टी रद्द, क्या है 15 अगस्त 1975 से जुड़ा दर्दनाक इतिहास?
creator: Zee News हिन्दी
Zee News Hindi
content: Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Death Anniversary: बांग्लादेश में तख्ता पलट के बाद से 'राष्ट्रपिता' की विरासत को मिटाने की मुहिम सी चल रही है. पहले शेख मुजीब की मूर्तियों को तोड़ा गया, उनको समर्पित एक म्यूजियम को आग के हवाले कर दिया गया, एक्सप्रेसवे से उनकी नेमप्लेट भी हटाई गई, Sheikh Mujibur Rahman : 1 5 अगस्त 1975 को बांग्लादेश के संस्थापक 'बंगबंधु' शेख मुजीबुर रहमान और उनके परिवार हत्या कर दी गई थी. देश में इस दिन राष्ट्रीय अवकाश रहता था और इस दिन को राष्ट्रीय शोक दिवस के रूप में मनाया जाता था. लेकिन अब हालात बदल गए हैं. बांग्लादेश में तख्ता पलट के बाद से 'राष्ट्रपिता' की विरासत को मिटाने की मुहिम सी चल रही है. पहले शेख मुजीब की मूर्तियों को तोड़ा गया, उनको समर्पित एक म्यूजियम को आग के हवाले कर दिया गया, एक्सप्रेसवे से उनकी नेमप्लेट भी हटाई गई, अब उनकी पुण्यतिथि पर होने वाली सार्वजनिक छुट्टी को अंतरिम सरकार ने रद्द कर दिया है. अपने ही 'राष्ट्रपिता' की पहचान को मिटाने की कोशिशों ने दुनिया को हैरान कर दिया है. शेख हसीना ने समर्थकों से राष्ट्रीय शोक दिवस मनाने को कहा बांग्लादेश की पूर्व प्रधानमंत्री और शेख मुजीब की बेटी शेख हसीना ने अपने समर्थकों से राष्ट्रीय शोक दिवस मनाने की अपील की है. उन्होंने एक बयान में कहा, 'मैं आपसे अपील करती हूं कि 15 अगस्त को राष्ट्रीय शोक दिवस को पूरी गरिमा और गंभीरता के साथ मनाएं. बंगबंधु भवन में पुष्प माला चढ़ाकर और प्रार्थना करके सभी आत्माओं की मुक्ति के लिए प्रार्थना करें.' छात्र नेताओं ने दी ये धमकी छात्र आंदोलन के नेताओं ने 15 अगस्त को राष्ट्रीय अवकाश...

title: اعتراف مقامات آمریکا و رژیم صهیونیستی به شکست ارتش اسرائیل در غزه
content: به گزارش بامداد پنجشنبه به نقل از پایگاه خبری عربی ۲۱، روزنامه نیویورک تایمز به نقل از مقامات آمریکا و رژیم صهیونیستی نوشت که اسرائیل هرآنچه توانست در زمینه نظامی در غزه انجام داده است و احتمال ضعیف کردن حماس به شکل چشمگیری کاهش یافته است. این روزنامه آمریکایی بدون ذکر نام مقامات آمریکایی و اسرائیلی به نقل از آنها اضافه کرد: اسیران صهیونیست که در غزه نگهداری می‌شوند را نمی‌توان از طریق نظامی بازگرداند. این مقامات آمریکایی و رژیم صهیونیستی افزودند: اسرائیل تلاش کرد که به شبکه تونل های حماس در غزه آسیب برساند، اما نتوانست این شبکه را از بین ببرد. آنها بیان کردند که شبکه تونل ثابت کرد که بزرگتر از پیش بینی های اسرائیل است و ابزاری مؤثر برای حماس است. به نوشته این روزنامه آمریکایی، مقامات پنتاگون معتقدند که اسرائیل نتوانسته است قدرتش را برای تامین امنیت مناطق تحت کنترل خود در غزه تثبیت کند. این مقامات تاکید کردند که دیپلماسی تنها راهی است که اسرائیل را قادر می سازد تا اسیران خود در غزه را بازگرداند. ارتش رژیم اشغالگر اسرائیل چندین بار به عدم امکان دستیابی به هدف اصلی حملات وحشیانه خود علیه ساکنان نوار غزه که نابودی جنبش حماس اعلام شده است، اذعان و تاکید کرده است که حماس اندیشه ای است که نابود شدنی نیست. «دانیال هاگاری» سخنگوی ارتش رژیم صهیونیستی در ژوئن گذشته گفت که صحبت از نابودی حماس مانند پاشیدن ماسه در چشم مردم است در حالیکه این جنبش در قلب مردم کاشته شده است. وی در مصاحبه با شبکه ۱۳ رژیم صهیونیستی با انتقاد از رهبران سیاسی این رژیم که خواستار حذف جنبش مقاومت...

title: KPUD Ingatkan Syarat Dan Ketentuan Calon Pendaftar Pilkada Depok
content: Komisi Pemilihan Umum (KPU) Kota telah mensosialisasikan tentang ketentuan persyaratan pendaftaran kepada partai pengusung calon pendaftar. Hal itu disosialisasikan mengingat pendaftaran calon Wali Kota dan Wakil Wali Kota segera dibuka. Ketua KPU Kota , Willy Sumarlin mengatakan, KPU Kota Depok telah mensosialisasi pencalonan untuk pemilihan Wali Kota dan Wakil Wali Kota Depok 2024. Sosialisasi tersebut disampaikan kepada pemimpin partai politik di Kota Depok. Baca Juga "Ini kan tahapan pencalonan sudah semakin dekat, kita mengumpulkan pengusung partai politik untuk mengetahui, sejauh mana proses pencalonan pemilihan Wali Kota dan Wakil Wali Kota Depok 2024,” ujar Willy, Rabu (14/8/2024). Advertisement Pendaftaran calon Wali Kota dan Wakil Wali Kota akan dibuka pada 27 Agustus sampai 29 Agustus 2024. Adapun syarat calon Wali Kota dan Wakil Wali Kota yang mendaftar, minimal mendapatkan dukungan dari partai politik yang duduk di DPRD Depok. "Artinya dari 50 kursi itu minimal 10 kursi suara perolehan hasil pemilu sebelumnya,” jelas Willy. Calon Wali dan Wakil Wali Kota Depok yang daftar akan diterima apabila sudah memenuhi jumlah keterwakilan kursi di DPRD Kota Depok. Selain itu, terdapat sejumlah poin partai pengusung yang harus ditandatangani bersama. "Kemudian yang baru terkait dengan proses pencalonan ini adalah penyusunan visi-misi harus sesuai dengan RPJMD Kota Depok,”...

title: Kamala Harris setzt auf Wohnraum und Lebenshaltungskosten
8 cách ăn cơm trong chế độ ăn kiêng giảm cân
content: 1. Lựa chọn ngũ cốc nguyên hạt Nên lựa chọn gạo lứt thay vì gạo trắng. Với loại gạo ít được chế biến hơn và giữ lại cám và mầm, rất giàu chất xơ, vitamin và khoáng chất. 2. Cân bằng với rau và protein Kết hợp cơm với nguồn protein như đậu lăng, đậu gà hoặc thịt gà, điều này giúp cân bằng bữa ăn và cung cấp năng lượng bền vững. Hiệp hội Tim mạch Hoa Kỳ gợi ý rằng kết hợp cơm với đậu sẽ tạo ra một bữa ăn giàu protein, một món ăn chính. 3. Kết hợp với thực phẩm giàu chất xơ Ăn cơm với các món ăn kèm giàu chất xơ như salad, rau hấp hoặc sữa chua. Chất xơ giúp tiêu hóa và tăng khối lượng, giúp bạn no lâu hơn. 4. Kết hợp các loại ngũ cốc hỗn hợp Trộn gạo với các loại ngũ cốc khác như quinoa hoặc lúa mạch. Điều này làm tăng thành phần dinh dưỡng và thêm sự đa dạng cho bữa ăn. Lợi ích của quinoa không chỉ là giảm cân, mà còn giúp điều chỉnh lượng đường trong máu cũng như sức khỏe tim mạch. 5. Cấp nước và cân bằng Đảm bảo đủ nước là điều quan trọng khi thêm cơm vào chế độ ăn uống vì cơm có thể gây mất nước. Nên uống đủ nước mỗi ngày 6. title: Kunci Jawaban Bahasa Inggris Kelas 10 Halaman 73 74, Kurikulum Merdeka: Pantai Pintu Kota
content: Berikut kunci jawaban Bahasa Inggris Kelas 10 Halaman 73-74. Artikel ini akan memudahkanmu dalam mengerjakan soal-soal Bahasa Inggris. Mengerjakan soal Bahasa Inggris SMA tak sulit lagi dengan ulasan ini. Dilansi dari berbagai sumber, materi pada bagian ini membahas tentang materi yang terdapat pada buku Bahasa Inggris kelas 10 terkait materi The Red Bird Paradise. Kunci Jawaban Bahasa Inggris Kelas 10 Halaman 73 74 Soal Halaman 73 This text is for questions 15 of 17. Pantai Pintu Kota or City Gate Beach is located in Airlouw Hamlet, Nusaniwe District, Ambon, Maluku. It is about a 45-minute drive from downtown Ambon. It is one of the beaches that are quite popular among domestic and foreign tourists. This beach has a beautiful view of a rocky and stony beach. There is a hollow cliff at the beach. It is very unique because it has the shape of a gate. That's why, it becomes the icon of this beach. This beach is not too extensive, where most of the area is filled with corals and rocks. The coastal area provides a parking zone with a roomy and comfortable space. In the coastal area, several huts can be used as shelters for enjoying the beauty of the beach. There are some food stalls, as well as homestays or inns around this beach area. Kunci Jawaban Bahasa Inggris Kelas 10 Halaman 73 15. Why is this beach named Pintu Kota Beach? D. It has a unique cliff that looks like a gate.

title: Late homers by Wyatt Langford, Jonah Heim lead Rangers to come-from-behind 9-7 win over Red Sox
creator: Maureen Mullen, The Associated Press
content: Late homers by Wyatt Langford, Jonah Heim lead Rangers to come-from-behind 9-7 win over Red Sox BOSTON (AP) — Wyatt Langford hit a tying three-run homer with two outs in the ninth inning and Jonah Heim had a two-run homer in the 10th to lead the Texas Rangers to a 9-7 win over the Boston Red Sox on Wednesday night, avoiding a three-game sweep. Maureen Mullen, The Associated Press Aug 14, 2024 7:44 PM Share by Email Share on Facebook Share on X Share on LinkedIn Print Share via Text Message Texas Rangers' Wyatt Langford watches the flight of his three-run home run in the ninth inning of a baseball game against the Boston Red Sox at Fenway Park, Wednesday, Aug. 14, 2024, in Boston. (AP Photo/Charles Krupa) BOSTON (AP) — Wyatt Langford hit a tying three-run homer with two outs in the ninth inning and Jonah Heim had a two-run homer in the 10th to lead the Texas Rangers to a 9-7 win over the Boston Red Sox on Wednesday night, avoiding a three-game sweep. “Those are huge at-bats,” Texas manager Bruce Bochy said of Heim’s and Langford’s homers. “It’s hard to have a bigger home run than that, down three to tie it there. So, good for him. We needed this win in the worst way. You’re always hoping when you have a game like this that it does do a lot for the club.” Heim’s homer came on the first pitch from Boston reliever Zach Kelly (4-2), scoring automatic runner Ezequiel Duran....

title: 体長約1m 罠から飛び出してきたクマに襲われる 80代男性が顔面を負傷(福島テレビ)

title: Thần đồng 5 tuổi nói tiếng Anh "như gió", 13 tuổi đỗ ĐH danh giá nhưng trượt dốc đáng tiếc: 1 sai lầm khiến nhiều phụ huynh "giật mình"
content: Tôn Thiên Xương, cậu bé thiên tài 13 tuổi được nhận vào Đại học Khoa học và Công nghệ Trung Quốc trọng điểm là tin tức gây chấn động truyền thông đất nước tỷ dân một thời. Cậu sinh ra trong một gia đình bố mẹ đều là công chức Nhà nước, ông bà là giáo viên đã về hưu tại Vũ Hán (Trung Quốc) Khi Thiên Xương còn nhỏ, mẹ dán chữ Hán lên tường, bà nói tên tiếng Anh của đồ vật quanh nhà để cậu cậu bé làm quen với bầu không khí học tập. Không ngờ Tôn Thiên Xương học chữ rất nhanh, mới 2 tuổi đã biết 2.000 Hán tự, tương đương trình độ học sinh lớp 3 và bắt đầu biết đọc. Mọi người xung quanh gọi cậu bé là "thần đồng", hy vọng vào tương lai xán lạn của Thiên Xương. Tuy nhiên khi cậu đi học lại thường xuyên bị cô giáo phạt vì những lỗi nhỏ nhặt. Điều này làm gia đình Tôn băn khoăn liệu phương pháp giáo dục ở trường học có phù hợp với con mình không. Ông nội Thiên Xương cho rằng: , việc giáo dục máy móc không có lợi cho sự trưởng thành cho trẻ em. Vì vậy, cả gia đình quyết định dạy cậu bé tại nhà. Ảnh minh hoạ Dưới sự hướng dẫn của ông bà, bố mẹ, Tôn Thiên Xương có nhiều sở thích như chơi...

title: 'Rather be Harris today': Nate Silver tells Fox News presidential race has shifted
creator: Matthew Chapman
content: Election forecaster Nate Silver has been one of the most bullish on former President Donald Trump's chances at re-election in recent months, but even he believes the winds have shifted. In an interview on Fox News Wednesday evening, Silver said he believes the picture has changed dramatically in the few short weeks since President Joe Biden abandoned his re-election campaign and stepped aside for Vice President Kamala Harris . "Polls are a snapshot of the time," said anchor Bret Baier . "You talk about this all the time. But where is the snapshot that you see right now in this race?" "If you have the election tomorrow, which would be a strange thing to do by the way, I think Harris would be a slight favorite," said Silver. "She has been ahead in most recent polling in the 'blue wall' states, Pennsylvania, Wisconsin, Michigan. Georgia, North Carolina, Arizona, Nevada all polling in the margin of error range." ALSO READ: Sen. John Fetterman violates financial law with botched corporate bond disclosures "Look, this Fox News poll is pretty good for Trump , that will help a little bit when we update our model tomorrow," he added. However, "You would rather be Harris today. People should remember though two things. One, we have three more months to go, there will be more surprises, and two, the polls have been wrong before, in the last two general elections they've both...

title: Turun Rp 5.000, Cek Rincian Harga Emas Antam Hari Ini, Kamis 15 Agustus 2024
content: Harga emas batangan produksi atau Antam, hari ini, Kamis (15/8/2024) turun Rp 5.000. Hari ini dijual di harga Rp 1.414.000 per gram, dari harga kemarin Rabu (14/8), Rp 1.419.000. Sementara untuk emas batangan Antam ukuran 0,5 gram hari ini turun Rp 2.500, dari harga Rp 759.500 menjadi Rp 757.000. Sama halnya untuk emas batangan Antam ukuran 2 gram hari ini tentunya turun Rp 10.000, dari harga Rp 2.778.000 menjadi Rp 2.768.000. Mengacu pada Peraturan Menteri Keuangan (PMK) Nomor 34 Tahun 2017, pembelian emas batangan akan dikenai PPh 22 sebesar 0,9 persen. Lalu pajak sebesar 0,25 persen setiap transaksi bagi pemegang Nomor Pokok Wajib Pajak (NPWP), sesuai dengan PMK Nomor 38 Tahun 2023. Tiap pembelian emas batangan akan mendapatkan bukti potong PPh 22. Sementara untuk transaksi buyback, PPh 22 akan dikenakan sesuai PMK Nomor 34 Tahun 2017. Penjualan kembali emas batangan ke Antam dengan nilai di atas Rp 10 juta akan dikenakan PPh 22 sebesar 1,5 persen bagi pemegang NPWP. Lalu PPh 22 sebesar 3 persen bagi penjual yang tidak memiliki NPWP. Harga hari ini 0,5 gram = Rp757.000 Harga hari ini 1 gram = Rp1.414.000 Harga hari ini 2 gram = Rp2.768.000 Harga hari ini 3 gram = Rp4.127.000

title: 'Lisa Frankenstein" starring Liza Soberano is now streaming on Prime Video
content: For those who haven’t watched “Lisa Frankenstein,” Liza Soberano’s Hollywood film debut, now is your chance! On Instagram, Prime Video and Liza shared a joint post announcing that the film directed by Zelda Williams is now streaming on Prime Video. “Lisa Frankenstein,” inspired by the gothic novel “Frankenstein,” follows the story of a misunderstood teenager and her high school crush, who happens to be a handsome corpse. Liza played Taffy , the popular yet kind girl who is also Lisa’s stepsister. American film critics , including Richard Lawson of Vanity Fair, Katie Walsh of Los Angeles Times, and Ann Hornaday of Washington Post, lauded her performance. The film also starred Kathryn Newton and Cole Sprouse . A post shared by Prime Video (@primevideo) — Hermes Joy Tunac/LA, GMA Integrated News

title: Boca juega este jueves ante Cruzeiro de Brasil, por Copa Sudamericana
creator: Redacción LAVOZ
content: Boca Juniors saldrá a la cancha este jueves ante Cruzeiro de Brasil en el partido de ida de los octavos de final de Copa Sudamericana 2024. El encuentro tendrá lugar en el estadio Alberto J. Armando desde las 21.30 , con el arbitraje del venezolano Jesús Valenzuela y contará con la transmisión de la señal deportiva DSports. Boca llegó a esta instancia luego de superar en los play-off a Independiente del Valle en el resultado global por 1 a 0, tras igualar en Ecuador y vencerlo en Argentina. Por su parte, Cruzeiro se clasificó directo a los octavos de final tras liderar el grupo B con 12 puntos, producto de tres alegrías y la misma cantidad de empates, lo que lo mantiene como invicto en el certamen. Probables formaciones: Boca : Sergio Romero; Luis Advíncula, Cristian Lema, Gary Medel, Lautro Blanco; Jabes Saralegui, Guillermo Fernández, Cristian Medina, Kevin Zenón; Miguel Merentiel y Milton Giménez. DT : Diego Martínez. Cruzeiro : Cássio; William, Zé Ivaldo, Lucas Villalba, Kaiki; Walace, Álvaro Barreal, Matheus Enrique, Matheus Pereira; Lautaro Díaz, Kaio Jorge DT : Fernando Seabra. Estadio : Alberto J. Armando (La Bombonera). Árbitro : Jesús Valenzuela (Venezuela). Hora de inicio : 21.30. TV : DSports.

title: Jadwal Puasa Ayyamul Bidh Bulan Agustus 2024, Lengkap dengan Bacaan Niatnya
content: - Inilah jadwal puasa ayyamul bidh di bulan Agustus 2024, lengkap dengan bacaan niatnya. Puasa ayyamul bidh merupakan amalan puasa yang dikerjakan selama tiga hari, bertepatan saat terang bulan. Mengutip dari , puasa ayyamyul bidh dilaksanakan pada pertengahan bulan, yaitu tanggal 13, 14, dan 15 setiap bulannya. Amalan ini termasuk dalam ibadah puasa sunnah, karena jika dilaksanakan mendapatkan pahala. Tetapi, jika tidak melaksanakannya juga tidak menimbulkan dosa. Berdasarkan kalender Islam, bulan Agustus 2024 berikut jadwal puasa Ayyamul Bidh di bulan ini: Dikutip dari , puasa Ayyaml Bidh memiliki berbagai keutamaan, di antaranya: Terdapat nilai penting dari puasa sunah tiga hari dalam sebulan, yaitu seperti berpuasa sepanjang masa. Dengan berpuasa selama 3 hari sudah cukup mewakili nilainya yang sama dengan berpuasa sepanjang hidup kita. Sebagaimana yang disampaikan Rasulullah SAW dalam sebuah hadist, "Puasa tiga hari setiap bulan, bagaikan puasa selama hidup (sepanjang masa)." (Mutafaq alaih).

title: Independence Day 2024: PM Narendra Modi Sports Multicoloured Rajasthani Leheriya Print Turban For 78th I-Day Celebrations; Pics
content: New Delhi: Prime Minister Narendra Modi sported a multicoloured Rajasthani leheriya print turban with white kurta and churidar for the 78th Independence Day celebrations at the historic Red Fort. For his 11th Independence Day speech, Modi also wore a light blue bandhgala jacket. In keeping with the tradition of wearing colourful turbans on every Independence Day since 2014, Modi's headgear this time was a mix of orange, yellow and green colour with a long tail. Indian PM Narendra Modi | X Indian PM Narendra Modi | X About Leheriya Leheriya is a traditional style of textile tie dye from Rajasthan. The leheriya designs are inspired by the natural wave patterns formed by the wind blowing across the desert sands of western Rajasthan. Last year, the prime minister chose a Rajasthani bandhani print turban with an off-white kurta and churidar. He had paired it with a black V-neck jacket. The turban was a mix of yellow, green and red colour with a long tail. About The Turbans Sported By PM Modi During Previous Independence Day Celebrations Flamboyant and colourful turbans have been a regular feature in the prime minister's attire for Independence Day and Republic Day events. In 2022, he chose a saffron headgear with red patterns and a long tail. With that, he wore a traditional kurta and a churidar, complemented by a blue jacket and a stole. For the Independence Day celebrations in...

title: Yankees' Aaron Judge becomes quickest player to hit 300 career home runs
content: CHICAGO — Now and then, New York Yankees manager Aaron Boone allows himself to soak up the reality of having one of the best vantage points in all of baseball, standing on the top step of the dugout as Aaron Judge approaches the batters’ box. “I try to remind myself what I’m getting to watch over there every day, with what he’s been able to do and just the player and the hitter that he’s become,” Boone said on Sunday. “It’s remarkable.” Advertisement Boone watched from the visitors’ dugout on Wednesday as Judge hit his 300th career home run off Chicago White Sox reliever Chad Kuhl , on a 361-foot shot to left field in the eighth inning. Judge became the quickest player to reach 300 career home runs, doing so in 955 games and eclipsing Ralph Kiner’s mark of 1,087 games. He also did it in the fewest number of at-bats, achieving the task in 3,431. It took the previous record holder, Babe Ruth, 3,830 at-bats to get there. Judge’s home run gives him 43 on the season, putting him on pace for 58 home runs and placing him in striking distance of surpassing his American League single-season record of 62 home runs set in 2022. Even if Judge doesn’t reach 62, he is compiling a better overall season this year than in 2022. He has a higher batting average, on-base percentage, slugging percentage and strikeout percentage compared to his 2022 season. Historically speaking, Judge’s current...

title: زوال عقل در بین بیماران پارکینسون رایج نیست
content: به گزارش به نقل از نت، این مطالعه همچنین نشان داد که اگر زوال عقل رخ دهد، معمولاً بسیار دیرتر از آنچه قبلاً تصور می‌شد رخ می‌دهد. دکتر «دانیل »، سرپرست تیم تحقیق از دانشگاه پنسیلوانیا، می‌گوید: «این نتایج تخمین‌های امیدوارکننده‌تری از خطر طولانی‌مدت زوال عقل برای افراد مبتلا به پارکینسون ارائه می‌دهد، و نشان می‌دهد که یک دریچه طولانی‌تر برای مداخله برای جلوگیری یا به تأخیر انداختن زوال شناختی وجود دارد». خاطرنشان کرد: «افراد مبتلا به پارکینسون از به زوال عقل می‌ترسند و ترکیبی از هر دو اختلال حرکتی و اختلال شناختی می‌تواند برای آنها و عزیزانشان نگران کننده باشد.» مطالعات قبلی نشان داده بود که ۸۰ درصد از بیماران پارکینسون ممکن است طی ۱۵ تا ۲۰ سال پس از تشخیص پارکینسون دچار زوال عقل شوند. تیم برای آوردن تصویر واضح‌تری از بروز زوال عقل در بیماران پارکینسون، داده‌های دو مطالعه بزرگ و آینده‌نگر را تجزیه و تحلیل کرد. یک مطالعه شامل ۴۱۷ نفر در سطح بین بود. شرکت کنندگان به طور متوسط ۶۲ سال سن داشتند، در بدو ورود به مطالعه به تازگی پارکینسون در آنها تشخیص داده شد و هنوز در ابتدای مطالعه درمان را شروع نکرده بودند. مطالعه دوم در دانشگاه پنسیلوانیا انجام شد. این مطالعه شامل ۳۸۹ بیمار پارکینسون با میانگین سنی ۶۹ سال بود. همه آنها حدود شش سال قبل از پیوستن به مطالعه، به این بیماری مبتلا شده بودند. تیم تحقیق خاطرنشان کرد که افراد در این مطالعه بین به مدت ۱۰ سال تحت نظر قرار گرفتند و در طی آن زمان تخمین زده می‌شود که ۹ درصد به زوال عقل مبتلا شدند. برای مطالعه پنسیلوانیا، که در آن...

Производство крупных промпредприятий КНР за январь-июль увеличилось на 5,9%
content: ПЕКИН, 15 августа. /ТАСС/. Объем производства крупных промышленных компаний Китая в январе-июле вырос на 5,9% в годовом исчислении. Об этом сообщило Государственное статистическое управление КНР. Как уточняется в распространенном докладе ведомства, динамика индустриальных предприятий страны за июль составила 5,1%. В том числе показатель добывающих отраслей вырос на 4,6%, в обрабатывающей промышленности - на 5,3% (на 10% в высокотехнологичном секторе), в сегменте поставок электроэнергии, тепла, воды и газа - на 4%. Объем промышленного производства в КНР в 2022 году вырос на 3,6%, а в 2023 году - на 4,6%. К крупным индустриальным компаниям в Китае относятся коммерческие организации, прибыль которых за год превышает 20 млн юаней (примерно $2,8 млн по текущему курсу).

title: I'm 58 and need pension income. I want to know how can I claim EPS from EPFO?
content: As per para 12 of the Employees’ Pension Scheme 1995, an individual who is a member of the pension fund and has completed ten years of eligible service and retires on attaining the age of 58 years can claim the benefit of monthly pension. Understand that in the given situation, the individual is 58 years of age, assuming that the person has retired after rendering atleast ten years of eligible service, he/she would be entitled to receive monthly pension from EPFO. For this purpose, Form 10D needs to be submitted online from the unified portal using their login. Members need to ensure that their bank account (into which monthly pension will be credited) is linked with UAN. Copy of bank passbook/ canceled cheque needs to be uploaded as part of filling Form 10D. Submission of this form is through generation of Aadhaar OTP, therefore the mobile number linked to Aadhaar has to be active. (Views expressed by the investment expert are his/her own. title: PM Modi Addresses Nation From Red Fort, Says ‘Every Indian Filled With Pride When Armed Forces Conduct Airstrikes’
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi addressed the nation from the ramparts of the Red Fort on Thursday, August 15, during the 78th Independence Day celebrations. Updated: August 15, 2024 8:31 AM IST By Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Thursday, August 15, addressed countrymen from the ramparts of the Red Fort. He hoisted the national flag for the 11th consecutive time as the country celebrated 77 years of Independence. While addressing the nation, PM Modi remembered those who sacrificed their lives for the country’s independence. He said that every Indian filled with pride when armed forces conduct airstrikes. “Today is the day to pay tributes to the uncountable ‘Azaadi ke deewane’ who made sacrifices for the nation. This country is indebted to them, PM Modi said. The Prime Minister Narendra said his dream of making the country a developed nation by 2047 is the reflection of the country’s 140 crore people. “We are proud that we carry the blood of the 40 crore people who had uprooted the colonial rule from India. Today, we are 140 crore people, if we resolve and move together in one direction, then we can become ‘Viksit Bharat’ by 2047 by overcoming all obstacles in the way.” “Viksit Bharat 2047 are not mere words, they are a reflection of the resolve and dreams of 140 crore people...We are capable of making India a developed nation by 2047 with our resolve,” he said. | PM Modi at Red...

title: Nämä lääkkeet ovat kuin myrkkyä suolistolle
content: Erilaiset ruoansulatuskanavan oireet ovat yleisimpiä lääkeaineiden haittavaikutuksia. Viestintäfarmaseutti Taru Vanhala Apteekkariliitosta listaa kahdeksan tyypillisesti vatsavaivoja aiheuttavaa lääkeainetta. 1. Tulehduskipulääkkeet Yleisin suolistoa ärsyttävä lääkeaineryhmä on tulehduskipulääkkeet. Käytetyimpiä tulehduskipulääkkeitä ovat apteekin itsehoitohyllystä saatavat ibuprofeeni, ketoprofeeni ja asetyylisalisyylihappo. – Tulehduskipulääkkeen akuuttia ärsytystä voi yrittää ehkäistä siten, että ottaa lääkkeen ruoan kanssa, Vanhala kertoo. Tulehduskipulääkkeet voivat aiheuttaa suolisto-oireita jo lyhyellä käytöllä. Osa oireista voi olla jopa vaarallisia. Koska tulehduskipulääkkeet ohentavat suoliston limakalvoa, ne voivat pahimmillaan aiheuttaa suolistossa verenvuotoa. 2. Rauta- ja kuitulisät Erilaiset lisäravinteet saavat vatsan helposti sekaisin. Rauta on tyypillinen esimerkki lisäravinteesta, joka saattaa aiheuttaa vatsan nipistelyä tai ummetusta. Apteekeista on saatavilla myös vatsaystävällisiä rautalisiä ja -lääkkeitä. Ummetuksen hoitoon käytettävät kuituvalmisteet voivat väärin käytettyinä pahentaa vatsavaivoja. Tavallinen kompastuskivi on, että valmistetta käytetään liian vähäisen nesteen kanssa, jolloin vatsa kovettuu entisestään. – On hirveän yleistä, että valmistetta on alettu käyttää,...

title: Who’s To Blame For The ‘Sad State’ Of Sydney’s Gaybourhood Oxford Street?
creator: Douglas Magaletti
content: In the lead up to the September mayoral election, the ‘sad state’ of Sydney’s gay neighbourhood Oxford Street is once again in focus. Independent Sydney mayoral candidate Yvonne Weldon has blamed Sydney Lord Mayor Clover Moore for the current state of Oxford Street. “We were talking about the sad state of Oxford Street in the lead-up to the last election. As another election looms, nothing has changed,” Weldon told City Hub. “The demise of Oxford Street has occurred on the Lord Mayor’s watch. The commitment to revitalise the strip and showcase its queer character and history have not been realised.” Oxford & Foley Development Halted Originally slated to be completed by 2023, in May, the Oxford & Foley development halted construction on its redevelopment along Oxford Street . Meant to revitalise the beloved gay strip, the Oxford & Foley development consists of three blocks along Oxford Street’s north side between Oxford and Foley Street. It includes new retail and creative spaces, bars, and restaurants. The Oxford & Foley development is currently covered by hoardings featuring the artwork of Queer Sydney artist Amy Blue . The hoardings were installed to help beautify Oxford Street, in the lead-up to Sydney WorldPride 2023 . Placing the blame on Moore for the repeated delays, Weldon explained, “TOGA’s development is the centrepiece of the Oxford Street ’s revitalisation. But...

title: Tianguis Turístico 2025 marcará un hito histórico al realizarse por primera vez de forma binacional: Marina del Pilar
creator: razon.online@razon.com.mx (La Razón Online)
content: El Tianguis Turístico 2025 marcará un hito histórico al realizarse por primera vez de forma binacional, catapultando la riqueza cultural y natural de México y Baja California a nivel mundial, resaltaron la gobernadora Marina del Pilar Avila Olmeda y el secretario de Turismo del Gobierno de México, Miguel Torruco Márquez. Funcionarios de los tres niveles de gobierno, se reunieron en el municipio de Playas de Rosarito, para instalar el Comité Organizador Estatal de la 49 edición del Tianguis Turístico 2025 que se celebrará en Baja California. Marina del Pilar agradeció al presidente Andrés Manuel López Obrador, y al secretario de Turismo, Miguel Torruco Márquez , por el apoyo recibido desde que se seleccionó al estado como sede para el evento turístico más importante de América Latina. “Con este magno evento, promoveremos un turismo que respete y valore la riqueza cultural y natural de nuestro estado y que, además, significará una fuente de bienestar para todas y todos, y no solo para unos cuantos ”, destacó la gobernadora. ¡Arranca la cuenta regresiva rumbo al Tianguis Turístico 2025 en Baja California! Es un gran orgullo que nuestro Estado será el primero del norte de México en ser sede del encuentro turístico más grande del país. title: ગુજરાત સરકારની મુશ્કેલીઓ વધશે? પંચાયત કર્મીઓએ ચડાવી બાંયો, જાણો શું છે મુદ્દો
content: ગાંધીનગર : રાજ્ય સરકાર અને પંચાયત વિભાગના કર્મચારીઓ માટે અપાતા પગારમાં મોટી વિસંગતતા જે લાંબા સમયથી ચર્ચામાં છે, તે હવે વધુ ઉગ્ર બની છે. પંચાયત વિભાગના કર્મચારીઓ, ખાસ કરીને વર્ગ 3ના કર્મચારીઓ, કે જેમને પગારમાં ઉંચાઈ નહીં મળી હોવાથી અસંતોષ છે, તે સરકાર સામે લડવા માટે મેદાનમાં ઉતરવા તૈયાર થઈ ગયા છે. આ મામલે ગુજરાત રાજ્ય પંચાયત કર્મચારી મહાસંઘે મુખ્યમંત્રી, નાણા મંત્રી, પંચાયત મંત્રી અને સંબંધિત વિભાગોના સચિવોને લેખિતમાં રજૂઆત કરી છે. માંગણીઓમાં ‘સમાન કામ માટે સમાન વેતન’ની માગ પ્રધાન છે. પંચાયત વિભાગના ક્લાર્ક, ગ્રામ સેવક, તલાટી, ટેકનિશ્યન, ફાર્માસિસ્ટ અને નાયબ ચીટનીશ જેવા વિવિધ કેડરના કર્મચારીઓએ પોતાના સમાન લાયકાત ધરાવતા રાજ્ય સરકારના કર્મચારીઓની સરખામણીએ ઓછું વેતન મળતા નારાજગી વ્યક્ત કરી છે. આ પગાર વિસંગતતાને દૂર કરવા માંગણીઓ ઉઠી છે. મહાસંઘે સ્પષ્ટપણે રજૂઆતમાં જણાવ્યું છે કે, જો સરકાર ત્વરિત નિર્ણય નહીં લે, તો આંદોલન કરવાની તૈયારી શરૂ કરી દેવામાં આવશે. આ પણ વાંચો: ગુજરાતમાં પાંચ દિવસ કેવું રહેશે વાતાવરણ? જાણો આગાહી રાજ્યના રેવન્યુ કેડર અને સચિવાલયમાં ઓફિસ આસિસ્ટન્ટ અને જુનીયર ક્લાર્કને 1900 ગ્રેડ પે સાથે ઉચ્ચત્તર પગાર ધોરણ 4400 રૂપિયા અપાયા છે. બીજી તરફ, પંચાયતના કર્મચારીઓ માટે પ્રથમ ગ્રેડ પે 2400, બીજા 2800 અને ત્રીજા 4200માં ફાળવવામાં આવ્યા છે. જેનાથી પંચાયત કર્મચારીઓને અન્યાયનો અનુભવ થઇ રહ્યો હોય તેમ જણાવી રહ્યા છે. આ કેડરોને યોગ્ય રીતે અપગ્રેડ ન કરવામાં આવતા, ઉચ્ચ પગાર ધોરણના ફિક્સેશન વખતે વિસંગતતા ઉભી થાય છે, જે સરકાર દ્વારા ઠીક નથી કરવામાં આવી. સરકારે યોગ્ય પગલાં ન લેશે...

title: شاحنات بخريطة المغرب في الخارج
content: تجوب أزيد من 80 شاحنة للنقل الدولي عددا من الدول الأوروبية والإفريقية وهي مزينة بخريطة المغرب وشعار المملكة وبعدة رسومات ورموز وكتابات وعبارات من خطب ملكية، وذلك في إطار مبادرة فردية انطلقت من مدينة أكادير تروم التعريف بقضية الوحدة الترابية للمغرب، وبعدالة ملف الصحراء المغربية. وقال الفاعل الجمعوي في النقل محمد أوصالة، وهو الواقف وراء هذه الخطوة: “الفكرة نابعة من إيماننا القوي والراسخ بأهمية الدبلوماسية الموازية في الدفاع عن قضايا الشعوب، فبعد النجاحات المتوالية لملكنا والدولة المغربية عامة في قضيتنا الوطنية لا يمكننا إلا الدفع بمبادرات تساير التوجه ذاته”. وتابع أوصالة ضمن تصريح لهسبريس: “الوطنية الصادقة والحقة التي تسري في دمائنا أبا عن جد هي المحفز الأساسي للانخراط في كل ما يخدم مصلحة بلدنا، في كل مناسبة وفي كل مكان. واليوم ونحن نحتفل بذكرى وملحمة استرجاع إقليم وادي الذهب لا يمكننا إلا أن نرصد كل إمكانياتنا للاستمرار في التعريف ببلدنا وبقضيته في كل دول المعمور”. “اخترنا بعناية فائقة وبألوان بارزة وضع خريطة المغرب وشعار المملكة وملصقات للزليج المغربي وعبارات من خطب جلالة الملك المتعلقة بملف الصحراء المغربية، وذلك في الواجهات البارزة بالشاحنات، هذا فضلا عن صور للمنتخب الوطني ترويجا لتنظيم بلدنا المغرب كأس العالم 2030 وغيره من المنافسات القارية”، يردف المتحدث ذاته. كما قال الفاعل الجمعوي نفسه: “أشتغل في إطار الدبلوماسية الموازية، وأضع كل إمكانياتي المادية والمعنوية من أجل القضية الوطنية الأولى، تحت القيادة الرشيدة لجلالة الملك. وقد جاءت فكرة تسخير هذا...

title: El tiempo en Mondariz: previsión meteorológica para hoy, jueves 15 de agosto
content: Esta es la predicción del tiempo para hoy en Mondariz según los datos de la AEMET El tiempo en Mondariz: previsión meteorológica para hoy, jueves 15 de agosto / Faro de Vigo Faro de Vigo Hoy en Mondariz , el cielo estará despejado durante todo el día, lo que significa que disfrutaremos de un día soleado y sin nubes. No se esperan precipitaciones en ningún momento, por lo que es un día perfecto para realizar actividades al aire libre. En cuanto a la temperatura, comenzaremos la mañana con 18°C y esta irá descendiendo gradualmente a lo largo del día, alcanzando los 11°C durante la noche. La humedad relativa se mantendrá en niveles moderados, con un promedio del 67% durante la madrugada y aumentando hasta el 72% durante la mañana. En cuanto al viento, predominará la dirección norte con una velocidad de 6 km/h durante la madrugada, aumentando ligeramente a lo largo del día y alcanzando una velocidad máxima de 35 km/h durante la tarde. Las ráfagas de viento más fuertes se esperan durante la tarde y la noche, por lo que es importante tomar precauciones si se realizan actividades al aire libre. En resumen, el día de hoy en Mondariz se presenta como un día soleado y tranquilo, ideal para disfrutar de la naturaleza y realizar actividades al aire libre. Se recomienda llevar protección solar y mantenerse hidratado debido a las altas temperaturas que se esperan...

title: После многих месяцев антиизраильских протестов ректор Колумбийского университета ушла в отставку
content: Ректор Колумбийского университета (Нью-Йорк, США) Немат Минуш Шафик ушла в отставку после длительного скандала, связанного с ее реакцией на проходившие на территории кампуса вуза антиизраильские акции протеста. Об ее отставке сообщила газета New York Times со ссылкой на официального представителя университета. Немат Минуш Шафик стала ректором Колумбийского университета (один из самых престижных вузов США, входит в "Лигу плюща") в июле 2023 года. В апреле 2024 года, на фоне массовых антиизраильских акций на территории университетского кампуса, она была вызвана в Конгресс США, чтобы объяснить комиссии конгрессменов, каким образом в университете борются с антисемитизмом. Беспорядки в это время усилились: пока Шафик выступала в Конгрессе, пропалестинские студенты разбили на территории университета палаточный городок и устроили митинг против войны в Газе, требуя от руководства университета порвать связь со всеми компаниями и жертвователями, связанными с Израилем. На следующий день, когда организаторы палаточного городка отказались расходиться, ректор университета вызвала на территорию кампуса полицию – впервые с 1968 года, когда в университете проходили акции протеста против войны во Вьетнаме. 18 апреля 2024 года на территории Колумбийского университета были задержаны полицией более 100 человек, а уже на следующий день появился новый, гораздо более масштабный...

title: बिहार के 38 जिलों में मन रहा आजादी का जश्न:पटना में सुरक्षा के पुख्ता इंतजाम; 60 जगहों पर 98 मजिस्ट्रेट तैनात, सीसीटीवी कैमरों से निगरानी
content: स्वतंत्रता दिवस को लेकर देश-प्रदेश में जश्न का माहौल है। बिहार के 38 जिलों में कार्यक्रम का आयोजन किया गया है। राजधानी पटना के ऐतिहासिक गांधी में राज्य स्तरीय कार्यक्रम हो रहा है। सीएम नीतीश कुमार सुबह 9 बजे झंडोत्तोलन करेंगे। पूर्णिया में रात में ही फहराया जाता है तिरंगा दरभंगा के व्यवहार न्यायालय बिरौल में 78 वें स्वतंत्रता दिवस पर झड़ोत्तोलन सपन्न हुआ। इस दौरान गार्ड ऑफ ऑनर सहित महात्मा गांधी की प्रतिमा पर माल्यार्पण भी किया गया। इधर, पूर्णिया के सहायक खजांची थाना क्षेत्र के भट्टा बाजार स्थित झंडा चौक पर रिमझिम बारिश के बीच दूधिया रोशनी में आधी रात गए 12:01 मिनट पर तिरंगा फहराया गया। सन 1947 से चली आ रही परंपरा को कायम रखते हुए स्वतंत्रता सेनानी रामेश्वर प्रसाद सिंह के पोते विपुल प्रसाद सिंह ने ऐतिहासिक झंडा चौक पर ध्वजारोहण किया। राष्ट्रगान के बीच लोगों ने तिरंगे को सलामी दी। भारत माता की जय, वंदे मातरम् के जयघोष से पूरा इलाका गूंजता रहा। सांसद पप्पू यादव, सदर विधायक विजय खेमका मौजूद रहे। बोधगया में विदेशी तिरंगा लेकर महाबोधि मंदिर में प्रवेश करते हुए। रंगोली भी बनाया। सहरसा में 78वां स्वतंत्रता दिवस समारोह का आयोजन हुआ। इसको लेकर जिलाधिकारी वैभव चौधरी ने झंडोतोलन किया। 8 बजकर 30 मिनट पर झंडा फहराया गया है। इस मौके पर लोगों की भारी भीड़ मौजूद रही। पटना के अलग-अलग इलाकों में झंडोत्तोलन पटना के मौर्या लोक स्थित नगर निगम मुख्यालय में पटना की मेयर सीता साहू ने झंडोतोलन किया। फिर उसके बाद डिप्टी मेयर रेशमी चंद्रवंशी, नगर आयुक्त अनिमेष कुमार पाराशर, सभी सशक्त स्थाई समिति के...

title: It Ends With Us Insiders Claim Blake Lively Felt Fat-Shamed By Justin Baldoni In Bombshell Reveal
creator: Rachel Choy
content: has allegedly told a bunch of people why working with on . None of this has been confirmed or , so please take this all with a grain of salt. Still, it could explain why . In the movie, there’s one scene where Justin’s character Ryle lifts Blake’s character Lily in the air. Sources told that Justin has a “history of back problems” so he asked his on-set trainer how much Blake weighed. Apparently, he wanted to get advice on how to train to “protect his back from injury” before lifting his co-star. The insider said that Blake was allegedly “really bothered” by Justin’s actions. At the time, Blake had just given birth a year prior and the source claims she believed Justin had fat-shamed her. Another source claims Blake also felt uncomfortable during one of her kissing scenes with Justin. According to the insider, Blake “felt he lingered longer than he should have with the kiss”. Seeing as TikTokers are convinced the pair were fighting on set, could this be the source of all the tension? However, then had a separate source claim Justin isn’t a “clear-cut villain”, because some of the film crew are on his side. According to the insider (there’s a lot of them popping up), he was “generally a nice guy to work with and cared a lot about the production”. The publication goes on to compare the feud to a Civil War, which is... dramatic, but basically there are a bunch of people who ride...

title: افزایش مصرف نوشیدنی های شیرین در بین کودکان
content: به گزارش به نقل از دی نیوز، بر اساس گزارش اخیر محققان، جوانان در سال ۲۰۱۸ در مقایسه با سال ۱۹۹۰ نزدیک به ۲۳ درصد بیشتر از نوشیدنی‌های شیرین شده با قند مصرف کردند. « »، سرپرست تیم تحقیق از دانشگاه واشنگتن، می‌گوید: «نوشیدنی‌های قندی افزایش وزن و خطر چاقی را افزایش می‌دهند، بنابراین حتی اگر بچه‌ها در جوانی اغلب به دیابت یا بیماری‌های قلبی عروقی مبتلا نشوند، می‌تواند تأثیرات قابل‌توجهی در آینده داشته باشد.» به گفته محققان، این مطالعه اولین تخمین جهانی از مصرف نوشیدنی‌های شیرین توسط کودکان و نوجوانان را ارائه می‌دهد. برای این مطالعه، محققان داده‌های بیش از ۱۲۰۰ نظرسنجی را که در طول دوره مطالعه سه دهه انجام شده بود، تجزیه و تحلیل کردند. داده‌ها عادات غذایی کودکان از ۱۸۵ کشور را ارزیابی کردند. تیم تحقیقاتی به طور خاص مصرف نوشابه، نوشیدنی‌های آبمیوه، نوشیدنی‌های انرژی‌زا، نوشیدنی‌های ورزشی و نوشیدنی‌های میوه‌ای شیرین‌شده خانگی را مورد بررسی قرار دادند. تعریف آنها از نوشیدنی‌های شیرین شامل ۱۰۰٪ آب میوه، نوشابه‌های رژیمی یا شیرهای شیرین نمی‌شد. مصرف نوشیدنی‌های شیرین شده با قند به طور متوسط ۳.۶ وعده در هفته در سطح جهان بود و از ۱.۳ وعده در هفته در جنوب آسیا تا ۹.۱ در آمریکای لاتین و کارائیب متغیر بود. کودکان و نوجوانان در ۵۶ کشور که نماینده ۲۳۸ میلیون جوان - حدود ۱۰ درصد از جمعیت جوانان جهان- بودند به طور متوسط هفت وعده یا بیشتر نوشیدنی در هفته مصرف می‌کنند. کشورهایی که کودکانشان بیشترین نوشیدنی‌های قندی را مصرف می‌کنند عبارتند از مکزیک (۱۰.۱ وعده در هفته)، اوگاندا (۶.۹)،...

title: देश का 78वा स्वतंत्रता दिवस आज:मुरैना के पुलिस परेड ग्राउंड में कार्यक्रम
content: देश का 78 वां स्वतंत्रता दिवस समारोह मुरैना के परेड ग्राउंड में आयोजित किया जा रहा है। प्रातः 9:00 बजे विधानसभा अध्यक्ष नरेंद्र सिंह तोमर झंडा वंदन करेंगे। बता दें कि, इस मौके पर विधानसभा अध्यक्ष के साथ मुरैना के जिला प्रशासन तथा पुलिस प्रशासन के अधिकारियों सहित स्वतंत्रता सेनानी एवं सैकड़ों संख्या में स्कूली छात्र-छात्राएं मौजूद रहेंगे। कार्यक्रम में जिला पुलिस बल के अलावा पांचवी बटालियन एसएएफ प्रमुख रूप से ग्राउंड में परेड करेगी। परेड की सलामी विधानसभा अध्यक्ष लेंगे। इस मौके पर सैकड़ो की संख्या में स्कूल छात्र-छात्राओं द्वारा आकर्षक कार्यक्रमों की प्रस्तुतियां दी जाएगी। इन देशभक्ति प्रस्तुतियों को देखने के लिए शहर भर से लोग एकत्रित रहेंगे।

title: बूंदी में ऊर्जा राज्य मंत्री हीरालाल नागर करेंगे ध्वजारोहण:पुलिस परेड ग्राउंड होगा मुख्य समारोह, श्रेष्ठ प्रदर्शन करने वालों का होगा सम्मान
content: बूंदी में स्वतंत्रता दिवस का जिला स्तरीय मुख्य समारोह शहर के पुलिस परेड ग्राउंड में मनाया जाएगा। यहां कुछ ही देर में जिले के प्रभारी मंत्री व ऊर्जा मंत्री हीरा लाल नागर ध्वजारोहण करेंगे। देशभक्ति से ओतप्रोत संगीत की स्वर लहरियों के बीच में प्रभारी मं तालियों से होगा स्वागत पुलिस के निरीक्षण वाहन में सवार होकर परेड के लिए तैयार रास्थान पुलिस, राजस्थान राज्य भारत स्काउट एंड गाइड, एनसीसी की टुकड़ियों के सामने से गुजरेंगे और मार्च पास्ट की सलामी लेंगे। राजस्थान पुलिस, राजस्थान राज्य भारत स्काउट एंड गाइड, एनसीसी की टुकड़ियां कदम से कदम मिलाते हुए सीना तानकर ध्वज मंच के सामने से गुजरेंगी तो सभी लोग तालियों से स्वागत करेंगे। इसके बाद अलग-अलग स्कूलों की टीमें देशभक्ति व सांस्कृतिक कार्यक्रमों की प्रस्तुतियां देंगी। विभिन्न स्तरों पर श्रेष्ठ कामकाज करने वाले सरकारी कर्मचारियों, अधिकारियों और शिक्षा के क्षेत्र में श्रेष्ठ प्रदर्शन करने वालों का सम्मान किया जाएगा। जिला स्तरीय समारोह में सुरक्षा के हैं कड़े प्रबंध इससे पहले कार्यक्रम स्थल पर सुरक्षा के कड़े प्रबंध किए गए हैं। प्रवेश के लिए अलग-अलग रास्ते रखे गए हैं। मुख्य अतिथि और अन्य विशिष्ट लोगों के प्रवेश के लिए अलग रास्ता रखा गया है, जबकि सामान्य लोगों और विद्यार्थियों को अलग रास्ते से प्रवेश करवाया जाएगा। जांच के बाद इन लोगों की एंट्री होगी।

title: 指對公眾安全構成風險 墨爾本禁電動滑板車租賃
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 澳洲墨爾本市周二(13日)通過一項出租電動滑板車的禁令,禁止在市中心的商業區使用,指它們對公眾安全構成不可接受的風險。 墨爾本市議會以6比4的票數,通過這項禁令。Lime和Neuron兩家運營商被勒令30日內移走電動滑板車。該市議會早於2022年2月,展開為期兩年的出租電動滑板車試用計劃,但此後發生數百宗事故,引發公憤及大量投訴。電動滑板車的行駛速度最高可達時速26公里。 相關新聞: 遊日注意|電動行李箱視同「綿羊仔」 兩大機場籲勿駕駛或被檢控 遊日注意|中國女子大阪街頭騎電動行李箱被檢控 日本首宗打擊個案 墨爾本市長里斯表示,他對一些滑板車使用者的不良行為感到厭倦,「太多人在行人路上騎行,且沒有正確停放滑板車,像垃圾一樣散落市內各處,引致令人絆倒的危險。」

Почти 500 авиарейсов отменят в Японии из-за сильного тайфуна
content: Тайфун «Ампил» стал причиной отмены почти 500 авиарейсов внутренних линий в Японии 16 августа, сообщает ТАСС . По информации агентства, авиакомпания JAL отменяет 191 рейса, а компания ANA – второй по величине авиаперевозчик Японии отменил не менее 280 авиарейсов. Кроме того, железнодорожники также готовятся к непогоде. Так, компания JR не исключает приостановки движения скоростных экспрессов «синкансэн». В ТАСС напомнили, что по прогнозам метеорологов, тайфун приблизится к Токио утром 16 августа. Скорость порывов ветра в районе прохождения тропического шторма сейчас достигает 30-45 м/с.

title: 國防預算破GDP2.6%創新高 王定宇:展現台灣保衛自己決心
content: 民進黨立委王定宇。(資料照) 〔記者謝君臨/台北報導〕台灣明年度國防預算首度超過國內生產毛額(GDP)2.6%,達到佔比新高。民進黨立委王定宇表示,這也展現出台灣保衛自己的決心,「不可否認的,賴清德可以說是史上對國防付出最高的總統,這點我們予以肯定。」另,對於西方智庫、盟友建議,美軍軍艦穿越台灣海峽的頻率應提高,他則樂見這樣的建議,「但保護台灣安全還是得靠我們自己。」 王定宇指出,台灣明年度國防預算首度突破GDP2.6%,這是史上佔比最高的一次,也展現出台灣及賴政府對於保護自己的決心,和提高國防預算的努力。 請繼續往下閱讀... 對於西方智庫或重要盟友都希望台灣國防預算佔比再提高到3、5%等,王定宇表示,可以體會重要民主盟友對台灣安全的重視,所以會期待台灣國防投資、預算能夠繼續成長;「安全無止盡,我們會繼續努力。」至於未來佔比是否持續提高,他說,當然這要看台灣的經濟狀況,以及整體施政和各項支出的佔比。 此外,對於美國重要盟友和智庫建議,美軍應提高軍艦穿越台海的頻率和次數,王定宇說,台海是國際海域,樂見任何對這個區域的安全、和平、穩定有幫助的活動;自由民主盟友的軍艦,不管是美國第七艦隊,或澳洲、加拿大等重要民主國家穿越台海,目的是為了讓這個地方維持和平、穩定,樂見這樣的建議,但保護台灣安全還是靠我們自己。 王定宇也提及,重要盟友的協助我們表達感謝,更重要的是,窮兵黷武的中共能夠體會,作為亞洲大國,老是在霸凌周邊鄰國、老是不遵守國際規範、老是要軍事擴張,除了傷害周邊鄰國關係,對中國其實一點好處都沒有。 不用抽 不用搶 現在用APP看新聞 保證天天中獎 點我下載APP 按我看活動辦法

title: 岸田政権と沖縄との約3年間を振り返る 聞く力をアピールも県民はどう評価した?(沖縄テレビOTV)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 8/15(木) 11:43 配信 沖縄テレビ 岸田首相は2024年9月に予定されている自民党総裁選への立候補を見送ることを表明しました。約3年に渡り岸田首相は沖縄とどう向き合ってきたのか振り返ります。岸田首相(2024年8月14日):「自民党が変わる事を示す最も分かりやすい最初の一歩は私が身を引く事であります」「来たる総裁選には出馬いたしません」岸田首相は「旧統一教会の問題や政治とカネを巡る問題などで政治不信を招いた」と述べ「組織の長として責任を取ることに躊躇は無い」として、9月に予定されている自民党総裁選の立候補を見送る考えを表明しました。外務大臣や沖縄担当大臣などを歴任し2021年に、第100代の総理大臣に就任した岸田首相。自らの強みを「聞く力」だとアピールしました。2022年、沖縄が本土復帰50年を迎えた際には県内で開かれた式典に出席し、沖縄の基地負担の軽減を明言しました。岸田首相(2022年5月):「復帰から50年が経つ今もなお、沖縄のみなさまには大きな基地負担を担って頂いています」「基地負担軽減に全力で取り組んで参ります」しかし、政府の対応はその言葉とは逆を行くものでした。岸田首相(2022年12月):「防衛力の抜本的強化は厳しい安全保障環境を前に一刻の猶予も無い待ったなしの課題です」岸田首相は、安保関連3文書の改定を閣議で決定し「反撃能力の保有」や防衛費の増額を打ち出しました。2023年3月には石垣市に新たな自衛隊基地が開設されたほか、与那国島や沖縄本島の自衛隊基地にもミサイル部隊が配備されることになりました。さらに、アメリカ軍との合同訓練が頻繁に行われるようになり県内ではこれまで見られなかった民間施設や公道での訓練が行われるようになりました。岸田首相(2024年1月):「工程に従って工事を進めるべく全力で取り組んでいきたいと考えています」国と県が対立する普天間基地の名護市・辺野古への移設計画を巡っては、地方自治法上、全国で初めてとなる代執行に踏み切り県の権限を奪って、工事を強行しました。岸田首相(2024年6月):「地元の皆様方と意見を交わしそして丁寧な説明を行うこうしたことを心掛けながら地元の負担軽減に向けて努力をしていきたい」岸田政権の3年間の評価を県民に聞いてみると...男性:「沖縄に寄り添ってという言葉を使っているんですけど、実際はアメリカ寄りの政策だった」女性:「基地は進展していないですよね」「沖縄の声を聞く余裕がなかった感じがします」男性:「あまり印象がない以前の首相と比べたら印象が薄いかな」女性:「やっぱり私たちの声は届いていないなといつも思っている」「沖縄県民、不満が多い人が多いのでは」自らアピールした「聞く力」をもって沖縄と向き合ってきたのか?岸田政権の評価は私たちに委ねられています。 沖縄テレビ “台風7号”16日関東最接近...Uターン直撃か...

title: Pete Davidson exits mental health facility two weeks after check-in
Pokonała Sabalenkę, teraz ograła ją Magdalena Fręch. Cudowny powrót Polki po zwycięstwo
content: Oprócz spotkania z udziałem Igi Świątek, swój mecz w sesji wieczornej podczas WTA 1000 w Cincinnati rozgrywała również Magdalena Fręch. 26-latka rywalizowała o awans do drugiej rundy z niedawną pogromczynią Aryny Sabalenki - Marie Bouzkovą. Czeszka lepiej rozpoczęła spotkanie, ale Polka zdołała odwrócić losy pojedynku. Ostatecznie zawodniczka urodzona w Łodzi wygrała 3:6, 6:4, 6:3 i w nagrodę zmierzy się z mistrzynią olimpijską - Qinwen Zheng. Magdalena Fręch przedostała się do turnieju głównego WTA 1000 w Cincinnati przez eliminacje. Została w nich rozstawiona z "1" i wykorzystała tę okazję. Najpierw spędziła na korcie 54 minuty w starciu z Hailey Baptiste . Przy stanie 6:2, 2:1 dla naszej reprezentantki rywalka poddała spotkanie z powodu problemów zdrowotnych. W decydującej rundzie kwalifikacji rozegrała już pełny mecz z Jessiką Bouzas Maneiro . Odniosła przekonujące zwycięstwo przeciwko zawodniczce z Hiszpanii, wygrywając 6:1, 6:4. We wtorek tenisistka z Łodzi dostała dzień odpoczynku przed meczem pierwszej rundy głównej drabinki. Tam czekała na nią Marie Bouzkova, a więc finalistka niedawnego turnieju WTA 500 w Waszyngtonie. Czeszka sprawiła po drodze sensację, pokonując Arynę Sabalenkę. Swoją regularną grą potrafiła doprowadzić Białorusinkę do frustracji . Z racji tego, że Fręch również bazuje na cierpliwym budowaniu akcji i...
